column5: hey guys just need a little help for the upcoming salmon and trout season i live close to bronte and i have never fished it yet. I was wondering if you could give me any tips or hotspots to catch multiple species of trout. any help would be much apreciated.  Thanks, Nick
It's about a month away from trout season.

salmon should be in there now ...after the next rain it should be pretty productive.....do your homework on a float set up and go get em ...worms roe or flys ( pick your preference).....check your regulations and have some fun ....good luck landing the fresh ones   welcome to the board
best bet would be to hit the pier  now with spoons and the like.
